p: Samples were diluted at a 1:10 ratio (w/v) with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS). Total RNA was extracted and the partial ORF2 gene was amplified by conventional RT-PCR for genotyping as described previously ( Kojima et al., 2002). The three samples from the patient were subjected to amplification of the full capsid gene, as described previously ( Vennema et al., 2002). The GII.4 NV viral loads in the samples were quantified by real-time PCR as reported previously ( Kageyama et al., 2003).
